  • Classes in org.nasdanika.persistence used by org.nasdanika.drawio 
    Class Description
    Marked  
  • Classes in org.nasdanika.persistence used by org.nasdanika.emf.persistence 
    Class Description
    Attribute  
    DispatchingLoader
    Registers loaders by prefixes and then delegates to the registered loaders removing prefix first.
    Feature  
    FeatureObject
    Object which loads its configuration to features identified by keys.
    ListAttribute
    If config is a list loads each element using createElement(), otherwise creates a singleton loaded with createElement()
    Loadable
    Objects which know how to load themselves from configuration may implement this interface.
    LoadTracker
    Adapter interface to track features which were loaded.
    MapAttribute
    If config is a map loads each entry value using createValue().
    Marked  
    Marker
    Position in a text file - yaml, json, ...
    ObjectFactory
    Functional interface for object creation.
    ObjectLoader
    Loads objects from configuration, e.g.
    ObjectLoaderResourceFactory
    Creates YamlResource
    SupplierFactoryFeatureObject
    Feature object implementing SupplierFactory.

  • Classes in org.nasdanika.persistence used by org.nasdanika.persistence 
    Class Description
    AbstractFeatureDelegate
    Base for classes delegating to a feature.
    Attribute  
    ConfigurationException
    Exception to indicate error in configuration resources.
    Converter
    Reflective converter providing some common conversions, some of them chained
    Feature  
    FeatureObject
    Object which loads its configuration to features identified by keys.
    ListAttribute
    If config is a list loads each element using createElement(), otherwise creates a singleton loaded with createElement()
    Loadable
    Objects which know how to load themselves from configuration may implement this interface.
    MapAttribute
    If config is a map loads each entry value using createValue().
    Markable  
    Marked  
    Marker
    Position in a text file - yaml, json, ...
    ObjectFactory
    Functional interface for object creation.
    ObjectLoader
    Loads objects from configuration, e.g.
    Persistent
    Something which knows how to store state into storage and load it from it.
    Referencer
    Creates a reference from source to target.
    Resolver
    Resolves references when loading persistent objects.
    SourceResolver.Link
    Link to source location
    Storable
    Objects which know how to store themselves to a Map, List, or scalar like String, Number, Boolean or Date may implement this interface so they can be stored to a hierarchical structure like YAML or JSON.
    SupplierFactoryFeature
    Binds Feature to SupplierFactory to indicate that the value supplier factory must be executed in order to obtain the final feature value.
